column1: Energy and Environmental Performance of Buildings MSc
column3: School of Architecture, Technology and Engineering
column5: The energy that buildings consume have a major impact on the environment, driving demand for more efficient and effective energy use in buildings with minimal environmental impact. Our Energy and Environmental Performance of Buildings MSc addresses these issues across the building life
column7: Course fees  UK/EU (full-time)8,856 GBP  International (full-time)15,462 GBP   Scholarships, bursaries and loans We offer a range of scholarships for postgraduate students. Bursaries and loans may also be available to you.
